text: Abdelmajid Lakhal (November 29, 1939 - September 27, 2014) was a Tunisian theatre and movie actor and theatre director. He was known on Arab Television for acting in many telefilms. He was known for his roles in Jesus of Nazareth, Day of the Falcon, and in Bab'Aziz - The Prince That Contemplated His Soul. Lakhal died in Tunis, Tunisia, aged 74. == Others pictures == File:Abdelmajid.lakhal.02.JPG|2006 File:Abdelmajid Lakhal in 2007.JPG|2007 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Tunisian movie actors Category:Stage actors Category:Actors from Tunis
title: Abdelmajid Lakhal
